snippet.title: Relivium - First Teaser
snippet.description:
Relivium is a survival horror game set in a mysterious military archipelago plagued with soldiers infected by a once dormant aquatic parasite, and a haunting, mysterious presence... Set after the events of WW2, explore, manage your resources, and survive. 

Relivium will be available on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1183350/Relivium/
Itch.io: https://intellipix.itch.io/relivium-demo

Follow us on our social media:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/IntelliPIX
Instagram: http://instagram.com/ReliviumGame
Facebook: http://fb.com/ReliviumGame
Website: https://adobe.ly/37WLAZN
